title: ChosenLib - Modern Fabric Utility Library
hero_subtitle: A comprehensive utility library for Fabric that streamlines common modding tasks. Build better mods faster with our advanced collection of utilities including AI systems, performance monitoring, custom dimensions, and much more.
new_update_text_1: ChosenLib v1.5.1 is here! This is a patch release that addresses a critical bug in the networking utility, ensuring compatibility with the latest Fabric API.
new_update_text_2: The networking methods in NetworkUtils have been updated to use CustomPayload for modern, type-safe packet handling. This is a breaking change for any mods that were using the old networking methods. Please review the changelog for more details.
feature_advanced_block_ops_description: NEW v1.5.0 Enhanced block manipulation with safety checks and transactional editing.
feature_entity_ai_utils_description: NEW v1.5.0 AI utilities for custom mobs and advanced entity behaviors.
feature_data_persistence_description: NEW v1.5.0 World, player, and global data storage with compression.
feature_effects_utils_description: NEW v1.5.0 Sound & particle effect utilities with timing control.
feature_advanced_networking_description: fixed v1.5.1 Sophisticated packet handling with encryption and compression.
feature_dimension_utils_description: NEW v1.5.0 Custom dimension management and portal systems.
feature_redstone_utils_description: NEW v1.5.0 Circuit analysis, automation, and logic gates.
feature_performance_monitor_description: NEW v1.5.0 Built-in profiling and optimization tools.
feature_world_utils_description: ENHANCED Enhanced with transactional editing, undo system, and pattern analysis.
feature_entity_utils_description: ENHANCED AI integration, enhanced pathfinding, and memory system.
feature_network_utils_description: ENHANCED Reliable packets, compression, and encryption support.
feature_gui_utils_description: ENHANCED Server-side compatible with major enhancements.
feature_text_utils_description: ENHANCED Rich formatting, performance optimization, and localization.
feature_item_utils_description: ENHANCED Data persistence, advanced validation, and custom items.
why_choose_modern_description: Built with the latest Fabric toolchain, Java 21, and optimized for performance.
why_choose_documented_description: Comprehensive JavaDoc coverage with practical examples and usage patterns.
why_choose_cross_platform_description: Works seamlessly on both client and server (GuiUtils is client-side only).
why_choose_mit_licensed_description: Open-source and free to use in any project, commercial or personal.
quick_start_description: Get up and running with ChosenLib in minutes:
whats_new_title: üöÄ What's New in v1.5.1 - Patch Release!
whats_new_feature_description: FIXED This release includes a fix for networking methods to ensure compatibility with the latest Fabric API. The `EffectsUtils` continues to provide a powerful utility for creating stunning visual and audio effects, with support for custom particles and sounds.
whats_new_released_note: üéâ Released: Version 1.5.1 is now available! This release includes important bug fixes and ensures compatibility with the latest Minecraft and Fabric versions. Check out our changelog for detailed information.
community_docs_description: Comprehensive guides and API reference for all utilities.
community_discord_description: Join our community for support, discussions, and updates.
community_issues_description: Found a bug or have a feature request? Let us know!
community_github_description: Show your support by starring the repository.
footer_description: A comprehensive utility library for Fabric modding that streamlines common development tasks.
footer_license_text: ChosenLib is licensed under the MIT License.
